entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Drizzle or flurries changing to flurries or periods of freezing drizzle this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries or periods of freezing drizzle ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 March 2023
